ygData.subject: Re: researched scrolls
ygData.msgSnippet: You can trade them ! I m sure you can research any spell you want using the proper items.  However, I have never experimented with this. You can only scribe
ygData.messageBody:
You can trade them !
I'm sure you can research any spell you want using the proper items. However, I have never experimented with this.
You can only scribe spells which are your level or below and of your class type.

Valacian - 22nd Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony

-----Original Message-----
From: Joe-Sebastian Cadiz [SMTP:nip3chi@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 12, 1999 1:37 PM
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_spell_research] researched scrolls

From: "Joe-Sebastian Cadiz" <nip3chi@...>

ok i have yet to see someone ask so i will
after successfully performing research, i hear you get a scroll
that you can scribe in your spellbook, is this one of those "sticky"
items or can you actually trade them with others, also, are they based on
level, ex can you scribe all the scrolls that you research, or only those
that are your level or below?
